act:
1457366 THE SIKH GURDWARAS (SUPPLEMENTARY) ACT, 1925
ACT NO. 24 OF 1925 [ 11th September, 1925.]
An Act to supplement certain provisions of the Sikh Gurdwaras Act, 1925.
WHEREAS it is expedient to supplement, by legislation in the Indian Legislature, certain provisions of the Sikh Gurdwaras Act, 1925 (Punj. Act 8 of 1925), for the purposes hereinafter appearing;
It is hereby enacted as follows:-
1515492 1 Short title and commencement.-
446303 1This Act may be called the Sikh Gurdwaras (Supplementary) Act, 1925.
1365301 2It shall come into force on the date 1 appointed by the State Government under sub- section (3) of section 1 of the Sikh Gurdwaras Act, 1925 (Punj. Act 8 of 1925).
1907207 2Validation of certain provisions of Punjab Act 8 of 1925.- The Sikh Gurdwaras Act, 1925 (Punj. Act 8 of 1925) (hereinafter referred to as the said Act), shall, so far as it adds to or takes from the jurisdiction of the High Court of Judicature at Lahore or prescribes the procedure of the said Court, be as valid as if it had been passed by the Indian Legislature.
362612 3[ Amendment of section 12, Punjab Act 8 of 1925.] Rep. by the Repealing Act, 1938 (1 of 1938), s. 2 and Sch. 999999 1 1st November, 1925; see Punjab Gazette, 1925, Pt. I, p. 712.
